The Mapping, Data, and Analytics (MDA) team at the Center on Rural Innovation (CORI) 
conduct analysis and develop software to support rural participation in the modern economy.

Want to collaborate on a project? Send us an email at <b>tech-team at ruralinnovation dot us</b>
